Yucky thingy(medicine)

On saturday,I went to see the doctor.
And today, i need to go to the mini concert and eat my yucky thingy...medicine.

Very angry about the L.S. Today...

Peoples were crazy...They kept talking, arguing, kicking, daydreaming...
When i wanted to ask them how to do Q.2 They said...(Don't ask me!!!~Read it by yourself~I won't tell u answers !!!x1000000000~
<+I don't need answers i only want explainations+>

They ask me questions for hudreds and thousands times.... per day
Now i want them explain the question to me only one question...
They will just shout (Dont ask me~READ IT BY YOURSELF~I wont tell u answers!!!)_
I dont need answers for sure...
I only want explainations...
Next time if they ask me how to that ~how to do this ...
I will say(Don't ask me~READ IT BY YOURSELF~I won't tell u answers!!!)_

Terrifig Ocean Park

Yesturday i went to Ocean park with Jason,Bonnie,Edwin,Christie,Jermain...etc
5:45~11:50The whole night...
Scared to death...
Scary zones:3 paths
ghost house:2 ghost houses
Most terrify halloween...

the second time when we walked path the Jungle Nightmare there were about16 ghosts
inside 5 of them block the exit way me and my friends were terrified...
I felt scared at first but then I felt anger comin through my brain so I shouted(Can you guys just let us go?Bloody hell...)AT LAST I SUCEEDED...

???????...

???????...

??...

Once apon a time there was a intelegent girl called Karen . Let listened to her adventure........................~At a hot afternoon..when i came back to my classroom...when i opened the door.There was a ruler hitted on my hand...I was very very ... shocked and angry,so I asked who did this...(I'm actually the queen of my class...although I'm not the monitres)...Ocean that's right Ocean ...He was the one who threw that stupid ruler to me and hit me...Actually when I came in the classroom I thought I was in a war...It was just a kiosk...Everyone were throwing things(objects...)to each other ....Some of the innocent hide under the chairs and tables and covered their heads with books...

Then i told the teachers immedietly...When Miss Choi came she was very angry...she asked the people who had thrown things to came out ...

Ocean,Wesly,Henry,Johnson,Joshua,Mattew Lau,Davis,Ivan,Aki,Aron etc...

A min or two later...Our principal came and shouted to those guys and said a lot of things...I'm the victims ...

At last we lose our music lesson The whole lesson was hearing our lawyer(The principal)to judge if we needed to kicked them out of our school...Very happy about this...

When school's finished I was very scared.Cos I'm afraid that they'll bullied me after this case...but i've already expect that...so i won't e afraid anymore most of my classmates support me cos they hate them tooo

Hope that they'll impove their behave...

Aman
